extendedInfo.description: Get anonymous, objective feedback on your cannabis use and compare yourself to thousands of other people around the world.drugs meter knows it not just about the cannabis you smoke â itâs how much you smoke, how you smoke it, who you are and what else is going on in your life.This quick, anonymous quiz assesses your smoking habits and adjust the results based on your medical and family history - to give a more accurate assessment of how cannabis is affecting your life.So if you want to know how your cannabis use compares to other people, work out the weight of your average joint, or just want tips on how to smoke safer - check out the cannabis drugs meter to see how you measure up.Features -â¢Immediate, anonymous feedback on your cannabis useâ¢Compare your use to thousands of other peopleâs smoking habits worldwideâ¢Work out how much you use and how much you spendâ¢Adjustment for different smoking practices - bongs, spliffs, with or without tobacco etcâ¢Photos of joints/bongs/pipes to calculate the weight of your average smoke in gmâ¢Adjusted cannabis consumption based on your medical and family historyâ¢Drug associated problem test to assess dependence on cannabisâ¢Tips for the future and advice on cutting downâ¢Safer smoking tipsâ¢Cannabis laws (UK only)â¢Cannabis and drivingâ¢Cannabis and safer sex â specific to gender and sexualityCannabis drugs meter was developed by Dr Adam R Winstock MBBS, BSc, MSc, MD, MRCP, MRCPsych, FAChAM â a Consultant Psychiatrist and Addiction Medicine Specialist based in the the UK.NotesAll information you submit to drugs meter is unidentifiable and untraceable.drugs meter stores the anonymous data from all submissions and compiles an ever-growing database which future results are then compared to, to build a picture of how people are using drugs around the world.drugs meter isnât funded by any government or other organisation and is committed to giving honest, accurate information.

reviews.title: Interesting
reviews.comment: Useful app for cannabis users.   Drugs worker
reviews.author: Basak Tas

reviews.title: This sucked
reviews.comment: It wouldn\'t let me pick my answers. Horrible. Disappointed.

reviews.title: Disclaimer
reviews.comment: Theres 12pages of disclaimer to get through which gets stuck on page 6 and cant get past it! Ive even re-installed 3 times, uninstalled now

reviews.title: Sucked!!!
reviews.comment: Good concept but did not let me choose my options, did not get past 2nd screen
